lyrics.text:
Pea ‘i he’eku ma’a
‘I he hia kotoa pē,
Pea hoko ‘eku anga
‘Eiki, ki he ‘Afiona;
Pea u toki ma’u mo’oni,
‘A e kalauni mo’ui.

‘E hoko kiate koe,
‘Eiki, ‘a ho’ kau mamahi
‘O loto haohaoa,
Pea ngāue angatonu;
Pea hao ‘i he mate,
Pea lava ki he lelei.

Pea ko e hala eni,
‘Oku taki tonu atu,
‘A ho kakai fa’a kātaki,
Ki ho’o ngaahi nofo’anga;
Kuo tuku ‘i ‘olunga,
Ki he kakai loto ma’a.
